term.title: gas-liquid chromatography

item.text: Comprises all gas-chromatographic methods in which the stationary phase is a liquid dispersed on a solid support. Separation is achieved by partition of the components of a sample between the phases.

term.citation: Citation: 'gas-liquid chromatography' in IUPAC Compendium of Chemical Terminology, 5th ed. International Union of Pure and Applied Chemistry; 2025. Online version 5.0.0, 2025. 10.1351/goldbook.G02586

Users of these terms are encouraged to include the version of a term with its use and to check regularly for updates to term definitions that you are using.
